wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Howard Ball (4 April 1931 – 4 December 1974) was a professional footballer who played as a winger. He was born in Walsall. In a short career, he played for three clubs. They were Banbury Spencer who he left in 1951 for Ipswich Town. He stayed with them until 1954, when he moved to his final club, Aldershot.

response: Joseph or Joe Ball may refer to:
* Joe Ball (rugby league) (1927–1964), English rugby league footballer
